desc: Beautiful shades of makeup for all beautiful shades of women. Paraben free lip products infused with oils to keep the lips supple and healthy. Luxurious skin oils to nuture the skin and help support the skins radiance and glow. Containing organic oils of the highest quality.

layout.text: FOOL-PROOF SHADES PERFECT FOR EVERY SKIN TONE
Vivid color. Antioxidant rich formulations. Long-lasting pigments and power.
